item.title: How to merge branch to trunk
item.description: To merge branch to trunk, remember following command. > svn switch http://trunk_url > svn merge http:://branch_url > svn commit -m "blah blah..." Change current workspace to trunk. Merge branch’s changelog to current workspace (trunk). Commit it with some commit message.
